floruit.note: 元豐間進士。徽宗初，提舉河南常平。

person.note: Li(2) Zhiyi [3484] Yuanfu coalition. Purged first for association with Su(1) Shi [3767] and later for writing the record of conduct for Fan(2) Chunren [559]. Hu Su's [8064] son-in-law. His Wenji, 50.371-375 has a funerary inscription for his wife, born Hu(1), who was buried in 1111 at age 58, and a burial ground stele for the Li(2) family which comemorates the reburial of his father and his wife in Taiping prefecture, where Zhili had moved in exile. None of this material is indexed in CBD or Aoyama. CBD, 2, 947, 1605.
